name: Miso Soup
desc: A simple and unadorned soup dish. The ingredients used here are very common and it is made simply, but this small bowl of soup has the power to ensure that you shall not grow weary on your journey, even if you travel on foot.

customize.name: Recipe: Miso Soup
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Miso Soup.

customize.name: Tofu
customize.desc: Freshly made bean product that has a silky-smooth tender texture.

customize.name: Seagrass
customize.desc: A plant that grows in shallow seas. It adds a unique flavor to dishes.

customize.name: Delicious Miso Soup
customize.desc: A simple and unadorned soup dish. The flavorful soup gives off a leaven fragrance. One mouthful of this with rice will ensure the completeness of the entire meal.

customize.name: Suspicious Miso Soup
customize.desc: A simple and unadorned soup dish. The wilted seagrass, the crushed little bits of tofu, and the overly thick flavor are a real hazard to one's mood if consumed first thing in the morning.

customize.name: Thoma
customize.desc: The Kamisato Clan's housekeeper. A well-known "fixer" in Inazuma.

customize.name: "Warmth"
customize.desc: Thoma's specialty. The intricate appearance of this dish belies the simple ingredients used. But take a sip, and Thoma's sunshine smile comes straight to mind. Perhaps this is his special ability: warming the hearts of others using the simplest of ingredients.

value.text: Restores 9% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 260 HP every 5s for 30s.
